mainText:
were apples.. 20 years ago during college at University of Chicago.. I still
have those computers.. and because they were my first I can't bare to get
rid of them.. I am grateful for the fun and creativity that Steve Jobs
brought to the world with his remarkable products.. he made the world
lighter more fun and inspirational..
thank you and I hope you carry on his spirit at Apple.. and make
accessibility to all the main focus..

-- 


~Enjoy the gift of the present moment.  Keep reaching for the stars each
day. ~
author: Nitha
